title: #223: The Secret History of Skull & Bones | Mark Steeves
description:
Host of the popular conspiracy show, My Family Thinks I’m Crazy, Mark Steeves stops by to give us an explanation of the dark history of the secret Yale University fraternity, Skull & Bones. It’s not just three generations of the Bush family, but also John Kerry, Steven Schwartzman, and many other powerful people including other former Presidents of the United States.

Mark also describes his wild journey from delivery driver to podcast host, and how the power of positive thinking can make all the difference in making dreams become reality. His project Alt Media United is the focal point for many podcasts in the alternative media, including Macroaggressions, as Mark builds out an oasis free from online censorship and social media manipulation.
